title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Mix eggs and cheese. 3. Combine with pasta and guanciale.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken. 2. Cook onions and spices. 3. Add chicken and tomato puree.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy dish made with a variety of vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce.
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan. 2. Add vegetables and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes. 3. Add soy sauce and garlic, and cook for another 2 minutes.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Soft or hard shell tacos filled with seasoned ground beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
instructions: 1. Cook the ground beef in a skillet. 2. Assemble the tacos with beef, lettuce, cheese, and salsa.
